alert.note: Alert for Clark; Crawford; Floyd; Harrison; Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 3:38PM EST until January 20 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EST /7 AM CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to three inches in most locations, possibly locally two to four inches in the southern Blue Grass. A light glaze of ice may be possible as well. * WHERE...Central Kentucky and far southern Indiana. * WHEN...From 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ this evening to 8 AM EST /7 AM CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to icy or snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds out of the north may gust to around 20 mph and will bring wind chills down into the 5 to 15 degree range by morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Indiana, for Indiana Road Conditions please visit https://pws.trafficwise.org. In Kentucky, for Kentucky Road Conditions please visit http://goky.ky.gov
